items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript/TypeScript library for working with binary data using C-like structs
items.title: remotex-lab/xStruct: A lightweight JavaScript/TypeScript library for working with binary data using C-like structs

items.content_html: Form Ninja is a lightweight, fast, and flexible JavaScript library for efficient form validation. It supports custom rules, error handling, and various input types like checkboxes, radio buttons, and file uploads. Designed for quick integration, it simplifies form validation with minimal configuration.
items.title: Roshan190/form-ninja: Form Ninja is a lightweight, fast, and flexible JavaScript library for efficient form validation. It supports custom rules, error handling, and various input types like checkboxes, radio buttons, and file uploads. Designed for quick integration, it simplifies form validation with minimal configuration.

items.content_html: üè† A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.
items.title: jens-maus/RaspberryMatic: :house: A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. items.content_html: "My IP" is a lightweight Linux program designed to quickly display your current IP address and its associated country flag. It is ideal for users who want real-time information about their internet connection, whether they are using wired connections, Wi-Fi, VPNs, or proxies.
items.title: tatami-web/My-IP-LINUX: "My IP" is a lightweight Linux program designed to quickly display your current IP address and its associated country flag. It is ideal for users who want real-time information about their internet connection, whether they are using wired connections, Wi-Fi, VPNs, or proxies.
